function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integration between disease elimination and broader health and development issues.","Impact":"Competition for funding and attention, potential for conflicting priorities.","Mitigation":"Engage in prioritization debates at the country level, promote integration between diseases and wider health and development issues.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations, and government officials.","Owner":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations."},{"Description":"Synergies between elimination efforts for various diseases may not be fully exploited.","Impact":"Missed opportunities for efficient resource allocation and coordination.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of exploiting synergies, encourage debate on trade-offs between priorities.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations, and government officials.","Owner":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations."},{"Description":"Difficulties in prioritization as elimination-targeted diseases become less common at community and country levels.","Impact":"Challenges in allocating resources and attention, potential setbacks in disease elimination efforts.","Mitigation":"Promote integration between diseases and with wider health and development issues, engage in prioritization debates at the country level.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations, and government officials.","Owner":"Health organizations, policymakers, international aid organizations."}]}
